meanings.sent1: The sheep had the flockiest wool in the entire field.
meanings.sent2: The clouds were fluffy, but the sheep's wool was the flockiest.
meanings.sent3: The sheep with the flockiest wool was the envy of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her flockiest scarf kept her warm on the coldest days.
meanings.sent5: The flockiest clouds in the sky looked like cotton candy.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the sheep, hers was the flockiest.
meanings.sent2: The new fabric was softer, but not the flockiest of all.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the flockiest sheep was fierce.
meanings.sent4: His flockiest sweater was a gift from his grandmother.
meanings.sent5: The flockiest blanket kept her cozy on chilly nights.
